title: Haunters: The Art of the Scare
description:
Happy Hallowe'en, True Story listeners! Tig and Cheryl scare their way through "Haunters: The Art of the Scare", a doc about the spooky world of DIY haunted houses. Will poooop come back to haunt Tig and Cheryl? What's on their mind these days? All that and more, on a hauntingly hilarious episode of True Story.

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

  • Follow the show:
  • Instagram: @tigandcheryltruestory
  • Twitter: @TandCTrueStory


Rate Tig and Cheryl: True Story on Spotify and Apple Podcasts and leave a review for Tig and Cheryl.
